mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize image sizes and scripts to improve mobile loading times and overall responsiveness.
loadingSpeedTip: Consider using a content delivery network (CDN) to speed up page loading, especially for media-rich elements.
seoOptimizationTip: Ensure all images have proper alt text and meta descriptions for better visibility on search engines.
userExperienceTip: Enhance navigation by simplifying the menu and reducing the number of clicks needed to find key information.
bookingFlowTip: Add more payment options and provide clearer step-by-step progress during the booking process.
tips: Consider adding more local attractions or guides to improve engagement and extend user time on the site.
Improve accessibility features, such as contrast for visually impaired users and better screen reader support.
whatThisWebsiteDoesInOneLine: We found that your website offers booking services for Sonder's accommodations in New York City.
